article.title: BAE Receives Navy Contract for TRIDENT II Systems Support
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: BAE Systems Technology Solutions and Services is being awarded an $82 million cost-plus-incentive-fee, cost-plus-fixed-fee contract by the U.S. Navy to provide systems integration support for the TRIDENT II (D5) Fleet Ballistic Missile program and the SSGN Attack Weapon System Program.
